text: @comcast @comcastcares @Xfinity April 21 at I was suppose to be moved to the Covid19 assistant program I never was my service was cut an I had to pay all late fees activation fees and more miscellaneous fees to activate my service again then all they did was credit my account $20 xfinity is a liar bra
